[[inst_hl_casd]]
==== HL.CASD

*Syntax:* hl.casd<.{aq, rl, f, aqrl, aqf, rlf, aqrlf}> [SrcL], SrcR, SrcD, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Compare and Swap: atomic 64-bit compare-and-swap operation.

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_casd.svg[HL.CASD encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/CAS
